meta.ogTitle: Custom Living Room – Framing, Drywall & Skylight Feature

hero.title: Custom Living Room – Framing, Drywall & Skylight Feature
hero.summary: From framing and drywall to finish-ready detailing, this project delivered a custom curved ceiling with skylight integration and LED cove effect.

role.label: My Scope
role.value: Framing, drywall, taping, team support, material management, daily reporting

overview.title: Overview
overview.body: Residential renovation featuring a custom architectural ceiling with curved transitions and skylight integration. Scope included framing support, drywall installation, taping/finishing, and coordination with trades to keep progress aligned with schedule and material availability.

responsibilities.title: My Responsibilities
items: Framing support for curved ceiling feature and skylight opening
Assisting crew coordination and daily task alignment
Material tracking, staging, and daily reporting

narrative.title: Process → Final
narrative.body: The gallery follows the project journey from structural framing and drywall boarding through detailed finishing, scaffold-supported execution, and final lighting activation around the skylight feature.
